summary: An Ordinance appropriating the sum of Four Hundred Dollars ($400.00), or so much thereof as may be necessary, from the Water Extension Fund, 1917, of the City of Seattle, for the purpose of paying the awards and costs in the condemnation of a pipe line right of way within Section 16, Township 22 North, Range 6 East, W. M. as provided by Ordinance No. 37693, Cause No. 128004.
